Package org.forgerock.openam.cts.impl

Class LDAPConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.cts.impl.LDAPConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LdapDataLayerConfiguration
    public abstract class LDAPConfig
extends Object
    Responsible for storing the configuration required by the LDAP implementation of the Core Token Service backend. Note: This configuration data is partitioned into the impl package as it represents the boundary of LDAP concepts within the Core Token Service code.

      • setDefaultTokenDNPrefix

        protected abstract org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.DN setDefaultTokenDNPrefix​(org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.DN root)
        This method should return a DN that is the default root for the token store, based on the provided OpenAM root.
        Parameters:
        root - The OpenAM root.
        Returns:
        The token store default root DN.

      • getTokenStoreRootSuffix

        public org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.DN getTokenStoreRootSuffix()
        The Core Token Service Root Token Suffix.
        Returns:
        A fully qualified DN (distinguished name) for the Root Suffix where Tokens will be stored. Maybe null.

      • hasChanged

        public boolean hasChanged()
        Returns:
        True if the configuration has changed.
